name: Content Validation

on: [push, pull_request]

jobs:
  validate:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - name: Checkout repository
        uses: actions/checkout@v4
        with:
          submodules: true

      - name: Setup Hugo
        uses: peaceiris/actions-hugo@v2
        with:
          hugo-version: "0.128.0"
          extended: true

      - name: Validate Hugo build
        run: |
          hugo --gc --minify --buildDrafts
          echo "✅ Hugo build successful"

      - name: Check for broken internal links
        run: |
          hugo server --port 1313 --bind 0.0.0.0 &
          sleep 5
          
          # Install and run link checker
          npm install -g broken-link-checker
          blc http://localhost:1313 --recursive --ordered --exclude-external || echo "⚠️ Some links may be broken"
          
          # Kill Hugo server
          pkill hugo

      - name: Validate frontmatter
        run: |
          echo "Checking for required frontmatter fields..."
          find content/posts -name "*.md" -exec grep -L "title:" {} \; | if read line; then echo "❌ Missing title in: $line" && exit 1; else echo "✅ All posts have titles"; fi
          find content/posts -name "*.md" -exec grep -L "date:" {} \; | if read line; then echo "❌ Missing date in: $line" && exit 1; else echo "✅ All posts have dates"; fi
